sense.def: Illness Sign of mental restlessness, with scurrying eyes and an inability to freely move. Bao ying ti yao Pediatric book. Ming era, 15th-16th 保嬰撮要 century. 1: 發熱飲湯，抽搐乏力，驚竄切牙，合面而睡者，屬心經虛熱 , “When they effuse heat and are thirsty, have twitching and lack of strength, with the [ eyeballs] scurrying because of fright , and when they press their teeth upon each other, and sleep with their face turned upwards, this is associated with a heart conduit depletion heat”.
